name: FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Ensure that all employees and subcontractors are:
– using the correct and complete set of drawings
– all drawings are the latest revision..
1.2 - Implementation of all measures and controls
FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All necessary measures and controls are being implemented, that is: EMP, TMP & SWMS
FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Chainage locations clearly identiﬁed for extent of kerb and channel by qualiﬁed surveyor.
○ Oﬀset for lip of kerb alignment shall be set minimum of 1m from Back of Kerb (BOK) and with ﬁnished heights indicated on survey peg.
RESPONSIBILITY: Project Manager/ Site Supervisor Superintendent
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All materials are to be on VicRoads current accepted products list and conform with the detailed design
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: The oﬀset, height and post spacing is to conform with VicRoads speciﬁcations and the detailed design

○ Where the face of guardrail is less that 1m behind back of kerb, the mounting height should be measured from lip of kerb. Otherwise measure from ground level Fasteners are to be snug tightened to AS4100
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: Detailed design 708.08 SD3661 AS4100
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Guardrail end treatments are to be installed to VicRoads speciﬁcations
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Where speciﬁed, motorcycle rub rail is to be installed on the new length of guardrail
The signature below veriﬁes that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the Fulton Hogan’s Quality system Procedures and veriﬁes lot compliance with speciﬁcations.
